attributes.action: Overturn the awarding of performance bonuses to Northern Rock employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is something fundamentally wrong when employees are likely to receive generous bonuses,Chief Exec. £4ook, as a reward for paying back the Government's bail out ahead of schedule. Why are we rewarding failure?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
